Name: Bob: A thousand lives
About the game: Bob: A thousand lives, is a dark themed platformer-action game, in which we control Bob, an abandoned boy, through his adventure. Along many challenges, Bob must overcome his biggest task, he must avoid his consuming past. His past materializes in an evil fog-creature which tries to disconnect him from the continuity in his timeline, preventing him from finding his eternal peace. ► A unique, depressing, story-based game. ► Approximately 15 hours playtime. ► A real challenge for fans of difficult games. ► Realistic 2.5D graphics. ► Many deaths and rebirths.
